mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO memberNo, FK_CATEGORY_NO categoryNo, MEMBER_ID memberId, MEMBER_PWD memberPwd, NICKNAME nickName, MEMBER_NAME memberName, PHONE phone, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createDate FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND FK_CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}

SELECT ADDRESS_NO addressNo, SC.STATE_CODE stateCode, STATE_NAME stateName, ADDRESS_TYPE addressType, DISTRICT district FROM TB_ADDRESS AD JOIN TB_STATE_CATEGORY SC ON(SC.STATE_CODE = AD.STATE_CODE) JOIN TB_MEMBER ME ON(AD.MEMBER_NO = ME.MEMBER_NO) WHERE ME.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY ADDRESS_TYPE
SELECT STATE_CODE stateCode, STATE_NAME stateName FROM TB_STATE_CATEGORY ORDER BY STATE_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, FK_CATEGORY_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, PHONE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{categoryNo}, #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{nickName}, #{memberName}, #{phone} )
INSERT INTO TB_ADDRESS ( ADDRESS_NO, STATE_CODE, MEMBER_NO, ADDRESS_TYPE, DISTRICT ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL, #{stateCode}, SEQ_MNO.CURRVAL, #{addressType}, #{district} )
INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER_IMAGE ( MEMBER_IMG_NO, MEMBER_NO, ORIGIN_IMG_NAME, CHANGE_IMG_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_MINO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_MNO.CURRVAL, #{originImgName}, #{changeImgName} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_IMG_NO imgNo, ORIGIN_IMG_NAME originImgName, CHANGE_IMG_NAME changeImgName, UPLOAD_DATE uploadDate, IMG_LEVEL imgLevel, IMG_STATUS imgStatus FROM TB_MEMBER_IMAGE WHERE IMG_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET NICKNAME = #{nickName}, MEMBER_PWD = #{memberPwd}, MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName}, PHONE = #{phone} WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
UPDATE TB_MEMBER_IMAGE SET IMG_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND MEMBER_IMG_NO = #{imgNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER_IMAGE ( MEMBER_IMG_NO, MEMBER_NO, ORIGIN_IMG_NAME, CHANGE_IMG_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_MINO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{originImgName}, #{changeImgName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N', MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
